resources:
Analog Watch Face
❤ Thanks for downloading the app! ❤️
This app is here to make it easier to install the watch face on your Wear OS watch. Once the watch face is installed you can uninstall this app from your phone. \n\n The whole project is open-sourced, so if you have coding experience feel free to contribute!\n\n If you enjoy using this watch face don\'t forget to rate it!\n
It seems that this device doesn\'t have a Wear OS watch paired with it. \nSorry for the inconvenience, but Analog Watch Face can only be installed on Wear OS devices.\n\n You can also do it manually from the watch by searching for this watch face on the built-in store.
Install Analog Watch Face Uninstall this app Check your watch! Something went wrong! Make sure that you have a Wear OS device paired with the phone.
